name: st_envelope
description: Determines the minimum bounding box of the supplied geometry.

params.name: geometry
params.description: Expression of type `geo_point`, `geo_shape`, `cartesian_point` or `cartesian_shape`. If `null`, the function returns `null`.

examples:
FROM airport_city_boundaries
| WHERE abbrev == "CPH"
| EVAL envelope = ST_ENVELOPE(city_boundary)
| KEEP abbrev, airport, envelope
